cause.description:
Diabetes is a disease in which millions of people throughout America live with and are diagnosed with every day. Diabetes mellitus is a group of diseases marked by high levels of blood glucose resulting from defects in insulin production, insulin action, or both. Diabetes can lead to serious complications and premature death, but people with diabetes can take steps to control the disease and lower the risk of complications. With your help, it could bring researches one step closer to finding a cure one day.
1. Many people with diabetes also need to take medications to control their cholesterol and blood pressure.
2. About 176,500 people aged 20 years or younger have diabetes. This group represents 0.22 percent of all people in this age group.
3. About one in every 400 to 600 children and adolescents has type 1 diabetes.
cause.mission: Help to eventually find a cure for Diabetes
cause.name: Diabetic Research
